name: Jumpin Jellies
description:
JumpinJellies is game where there's no objectives or tasks to complete. Instead you jump around as a delicious jelly, while drawing on the floor with your jelly juice and spawning other jellies to create cool random drawings.

🎧Headphones recommended🎧 Controls

Move : W/A/S/D

Jump : Spacebar

Spawn Jellies : Left Shift

Change Color : C

Save Drawing : Ctrl+S

Bug Fixes

- Fixed Music Volume Control not working

- Fixed Music not playing in Main Menu

Engine

Unreal Engine 4
